#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;

#define s(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sl(n) scanf("%ld",&n)

#define p(n) printf("%d",n)
#define pl(n) printf("%ld",n)

int getceilindex(long ar[],int l,int r,long key)
{
  int m = (l+r)/2;
  while(r-l>1)
    {
      if(key < ar[m]) r=m;
      else l=m;
    }
  return r;
}

int main()
{
  int t;
  s(t);
  while(t--)
    {
      int n, len;
      s(n);
      //int *ar = new int[n];
	  int ar[1001], end[1001];
      for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			sl(ar[i]);
		}
      
      //int *end = new int[n];
	  //std::memset(end,0,sizeof(end[0])*n);
      end[0] = ar[0];
      len=1;
      
     /* for(int i=1;i<n;i++)
	{
	  if(ar[i]<end[0]) end[0] = ar[i];    
	  else 
	    {
	      if(ar[i]>=end[len-1]) end[len++] = ar[i];       // equivalent to  { end[len] = ar[i] ;  len++; }
	      else
		{
		  int ceilindex = upper_bound(end,end+len,ar[i]) - end;                                   // getceilindex(end,0,len-1,ar[i]);
		  end[ceilindex] = ar[i];
		}
	    }
	}*/
	  int i,j;
	  for(i=1;i<n;i++)
	  {
		  for(j=0;j<len;j++)
		  {
			  if(ar[i] < end[j]) break;
		  }
		  if(j==len) len++;
		  end[j] = ar[i];
	  }
		
      printf("%d\n",len);
     //delete[] ar,end;
    }
  
  return 0;
}
	  
	  
// O(N^2)
